scripts.start: babel-node server.js & npm run watch:app & npm run watch:extra & wait
scripts.watch:app: watchify site.js -v -t babelify -p [ livereactload --port=4477 ] -x react -x react-dom --ig -o bundle.app.js
scripts.watch:extra: watchify extra.js -v -s Extra -t babelify -p [ livereactload --port=4478 ] -x react -x react-dom -o bundle.extra.js
